title: Book Review: ‘Requiem for the Massacre,’ by RJ Young
description: RJ Young’s “Requiem for the Massacre” is more coming-of-age story than reckoning.
dc:creator: Martha Southgate
category: Requiem for the Massacre: A Black History on the Conflict, Hope, and Fallout of the 1921 Tulsa Race Massacre (Book)
media:credit: Department of Special Collections, McFarlin Library, The University of Tulsa, via Associated Press
media:description: A group of Black men are marched down Tulsa’s Main Street on June 1, 1921.
